Status: Travis CI , Bioc-release , Bioc-devel .

Bioc-release , Bioc-devel , Codecov

derfinderHelper

Helper package for derfinder.

Installation instructions

Get R 3.5.x from CRAN.

## From Bioconductor
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("derfinderHelper")

Vignette

The vignette for this package can be viewed here or via Bioconductor’s website.

Citation

Use derfinder’s citation information.

Testing

Testing on Bioc-devel is feasible thanks to R Travis as well as Bioconductor’s nightly build.
